title: Entertainment One posts wider first-quarter loss
text:
Entertainment One posts wider first-quarter loss

Stock Markets 8 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 02:50)

© Reuters. Entertainment One posts wider first-quarter loss Oct 11 (Reuters) - Canada-based independent entertainment company Entertainment One Ltd on Friday posted a near seven-fold wider first-quarter loss, hit by lower sales in its film, television & music segments. The company, which has agreed to be bought by Hasbro Inc in August, said the loss before tax widened to 43.9 million pounds ($54.65 million) from 6.8 million pounds, a year earlier. ($1 = 0.8033 pounds)
